“Uh… hey there. Are you related to Rouge the bat by any chance? Like a… big sister?”

“Long story short, I recently found out Knuckles has a thing for bigger women. I gained all of this weight thanks to some special chocolate I found. I want to gain more weight to keep red head’s attention. That’s where you come in.”

Sonic put his hand over his face and shook his head and said, “Oh no, not you too. First I hear my gal Sally is a fat ass blimp, now you want to be one. And why am I not surprised that old numskull likes bigger chicks. Okay “Huge the bat“, what can I do to help?”

"I'm so sorry..." Amy told Tikal, "What was that all about anyway?" Tikal asked out of curiosity, Amy did not awnswer until Blaze and Tails went inside ahead of them unable to hear her, "The boys have been kind of... well... ignoring us." Amy had a very small amount of blush to her face as she told Tikal.

"Even Tails, none of us girls can figure out why, every time we ask they either run off or deny everything." Amy explaind to Tikal as her blush faded away due to her frustraition at the boys. "Well we should worry about that later, Tikal this is a day to celebrate your escape from that emerald." Amy put her arm around Tikla's head, them now in side by side.

"I Thought I'd be trapped in there forever, I'm still having troble remembering how I got out." Tikal replied. "Well if you ask me, all that matters is that your free and young to live among us." Amy began befriending Tikal.

"So while Tails and Blaze are getting their own things what do you think we should get for the party girl?" Amy jokingly refered to Tikal... as she pondered her awnser from the obvious treats visable in the window.

They all looked so sweet and delicious it began made Tikal a little bit hungry little does she realize this minor hunger is just the beginning.

"But I've always thought I'd look hotter with a little bit of fat," Julie-Su tried to convince him, "Isn't that why they call them love handles?"

Julie-Su froze, then she buried her face in her arms and ran away crying. She didn't know why Knuckles just treated her that way. Maybe he didn't understand a woman's desires. 15511.title: Blaze meets Big

155112.content:
later that day blaze arrived at big's house. It was a pretty big house by the beach,It had a fence around it with a sign by the gate that said " Beware of frog!" Blaze giggled a little at this as she opened the gate and walked in.As she walked in she noticed a big orange bullfrog with a blue star shape on it's back sitting by a dog house.Blaze looked at the frog for a few seconds.

"That is a huge frog." she said to herself. Suddenly the frog croaked very loudly and blaze decided to run along. She walked up to the door and rang the door bell. "Kero kero kero!" Blaze looked at the doorbell. " This guy must really like frogs." She said a little annoyed. The door opened and big walked up. "Blaze come in, I just finished making dinner!" Big said happily. Blaze walked in and looked around. The house was decorated with fishing decor and frog art."Blaze this is my pet froggy." He said as he pointed at a little green frog sitting on a lily pad in a bucket of water."Nice to...uh... meet you froggy." she said with a sweat drop."Kero Kero!" Croaked froggy.

"Well I got dinner ready in the dining room if your ready to eat?" Big said as he walked to the dining room.Blaze followed "Ok so what are we having for dinn...er?" Blaze was speechless. In the dining room was a big table with a huge amount of food on it. There was Shrimp,Lobster,crab,grilled tuna, calamari,and many other seafood related dishes. There was also a big keg of buttermilk by the table to drink. Blaze almost started to drool over the feast only felines have dreamed of, but she quickly wiped her mouth."Big! Where did you get all of this?" She asked in surprise. "I do a lot fishing and I'm a really good cook." Blaze sat down at the other."Do you always make this much food for yourself?" she asked him as she looked over all of the delicious food."No,I wasn't sure how much to make so I made a lot so you can eat as much as you want."

Blaze couldn't help herself she grab a fork and knife and dug right in. She ate for hours enjoying the sweet taste of crab,the buttery lobster, the deep fried calamari, and many of the other dishes.She also enjoyed washing down the her meal with the creamy buttermilk. After the meal big brought out a few strawberry catnip pies. Blaze enjoyed every bite of the pies as well. Finally at 11:30pm blaze finished eating, She drank the last glass of milk and sat the glass on the table.She started to rub her swollen belly."I ate way to much.....I think I need to lie down for awhile." She said with a sick look on her face."You can sleep in the guest room if you want?" He offered her. She nodded."It's down the hall last door on the left." He said pointing down the hall."Thank you."She said as she walked to the guest room. She went inside and closed the door. She took off her clothes and got in the bed and went to sleep.

The next morning she woke up feeling much better. She sat up and yawned."That was a weird dream, I dreamed I ate a huge feast of fish and got really fa.....!"Blaze suddenly stopped and looked at herself.It wasn't a dream she really did eat all of that food and her body had turned it to fat over night, she had gained...
155112.title: skip to dinner with Big

choices: Stay for breakfast! (Blaze and Big pairing)
1551122.content:
Blaze sat up on the side of the bed and looked at her body. Her legs and arms have gotten wide and flabby. Her butt was huge and her big belly rested in her lap. She got up and walked over to a mirror in the room. She could see a second chin on her face. But what really shocked her the most was her breast.

“Their huge!” She said as she rubbed her now big boobies.

She really didn’t mind this part of her ordeal, considering how flat she used to be. She looked by the mirror and saw a scale. She stepped on to it and watched as the numbers added up.

“400 pounds !” She screamed as she jumped off the scale.”I got to get out of here and find a gym fast!”

Blaze picked up her pants and tried to pulled them up. They stopped halfway up her legs. She then sat on the bed and pulled on her pants.

Riiippp! Her pants tore to shreds.

“Aahh! I out grew my clothes!” She screeched with a blushed face. Blaze then thought to herself. “What am I going to do? I can’t walk out of here naked!”

Blaze looked around the room for some cover. She looked over at the bed and saw the sheets. Taking one of the sheets she wrapped it around herself like a toga. She also noticed a pair of sandals sitting by the mirror. She picked them up and sat on the bed so she could put them on. They fit perfectly.

“Now to get out of here to find some new clothes and to find a gym.” She said as she grabbed her bag with the sol emeralds and exited the room. As she walked down the hallway, Big suddenly walked out of the kitchen.

“Good morning blaze. Did you sleep well?” He said oblivious to blaze’s new size.

“Uh.. Yes I did well I got to go now big , I’ll see you later. I hope you don’t mind me barrowing these sandals and bed sheet do you?” She said hoping he didn’t notice her fat self.

“Sure I don’t mind. Just bring them back later.” He said happily. Big then thought of something. “Hey blaze! I didn’t know you wore the same size sandals as me.” He said pointing to her feet.

Blaze stopped at the front door. She thought to herself “Same size sandals? Are these his sandals? Then that means!” Blaze then turned around and looked at big. She was the same height as him! She was fatter then him but she was the same height. She looked at the sol emeralds.

“The sol emeralds must have made me taller to adjust to this new weight!” She said to herself out loud.

“What?” Big asked blaze as he turned around to her.

“Nothing! I gotta go now, see you later!” She said in a kind of panicked tone.

“Wait! Aren’t you going to stay for breakfast?” He said pointing to a big breakfast in the kitchen.
1551122.title: 400 pounds!

choices: Blaze asks big why is he making all of  this food for her!
15511221.content:
Blaze could smell the delicious aroma coming from the kitchen. She looked at all of the food on the table. Pancakes, waffles, donuts, sausage, bacon, fried and scrambled eggs, hash browns, and of course a big pitcher of buttermilk. She licked her lips, Just looking at the delicious food made her hungry.

“Well… maybe a little breakfast wouldn’t hurt.” She said as she walked into the kitchen.

Big pulled the chair out from the table. ”Here have seat .” He said with a smile.

Blaze sat down and picked up a fork and knife. “Damn it! Why did he have to be such a good cook?” She thought to herself.

Blaze Once again began to eat. She started with a plate of pancakes and waffles. Big put butter on them and pour lots of maple syrup over them. Blaze cut into them and ate. After she finished them she moved on to the sausage, bacon, hash browns, and eggs. Half way though them she look up to see big wasn’t eating, he was just sitting there watching her eat.

“Aren’t you going to eat some too?” She asked him with a piece of bacon in her mouth.

“No thanks, I already ate. I just enjoy watching a beautiful woman eat.” He said to her with a smile.

Blaze blushed to this. “Did he just say I’m beautiful?” She thought about this. Then she just remembered something, He wasn’t eating anything last night either. “Did he make a this food just for me?” She thought to herself as she finished the last bit of eggs on her plate.

Last thing on the table was the donuts and milk. She started dunking donut left and right in the pitcher of buttermilk ,eating them after each dunk. There were custard filled ones, jelly filled, peanut butter donuts, devil’s food donuts and cake donuts each had there own frosting on them. After finishing the last donut, she pick up the pitcher of milk and drank what was left.

“Aaahh.” She said with a smile as she sat the now empty pitcher on the table.

She looked down at her body. She was now fatter then she was that morning, she guessed about 600 pounds now. But she didn’t feel sick like she did last night, she felt full and happy. She started to rub her belly.

“Would you like to take a nap on the couch?” He asked her.

Blaze looked at him with a smile.” Yes please.” She said holding one hand out.

Big took her hand and helped her to her feet. She followed him to the living room and sat down on the couch. Then big pulled the lever on the side of the couch making it recline. Blaze laid back and relaxed. Suddenly big started to massage her big belly.

‘Big what are yo….Oh that feels good!” She said as she started to enjoy the belly massage.

As big continues massaging her belly…..

Go get new clothes first, then go eat! (Sonic tells her he loves big women)
15511222.content:
Blaze could smell the delicious aroma coming from the kitchen. She looked at all of the food on the table. Pancakes, waffles, donuts, sausage, bacon, fried and scrambled eggs, hash browns, and of course a big pitcher of buttermilk. She licked her lips, Just looking at the delicious food made her hungry. But she quickly shook her head.

“N..No thanks I gotta go! See ya!” She said as she ran out the door.

“See you later blaze!” Big said while waving goodbye.

Blaze walked threw the yard toward the gate. On the way that big orange bullfrog jumped in front of her on the path and looked up at her. Blaze looked down at it.

“KERO?” Croaked the big frog thinking blaze was its owner big.

“NO I AM NOT YOUR MASTER!” She yelled at the now little to her bullfrog.

“Kero kero kero!” The frog jumped back scared to it’s dog..er.. I mean… frog house.(hee hee)

Blaze left the beach and headed back to station square. She walked around looking for a gym or a clothing store, Switch ever came first. She suddenly stopped when she heard a familiar voice.

“Blaze? Is that you?” Blaze slowly turned around to see Sonic the hedgehog.

“Uh…hi sonic.” She said a little embarrassed.

Sonic looked her over, he couldn’t believe it was her. She looked so big, so fat, so tall , so hot! Sonic just stood there looking at blaze with a smile on his face.

“Sonic? Hello earth to sonic! Sonic can you hear me?” She said getting a little mad.

“What? Oh! So blaze what are you doing right now?” He said with a sweat drop.

“I’m looking for a gym or a clothing store.” She said giving him a confused look.

Suddenly blazes stomach growled. She looked down at her big belly and rubbed it. She just remembered she still hasn’t eaten breakfast.

“Say I don’t we go to this all-you-can-eat breakfast buffet that’s just around the corner from here. My treat!” He said grabbing her hand and leading her down the sidewalk to the restaurant. Blaze looked at him confused as he lead her there.

“Are you asking me out ?” She asked him with a blush on her face.

Sonic smiled at her. ”Maybe?”
15511222.title: Gotta Go!

choices: To the restaurant he was talking about earlier !
Go to sonic's house where he makes her a big breakfast!
155112222.content:
Sonic continued to lead blaze to the restaurant. Blaze looked around and realized people were giving her weird looks. Maybe it was because she was dressed in a toga or maybe it was not everyday people see a blue hedgehog dragging a 400 pound purple cat along with him down the sidewalk.

“Sonic wait!” She said as pulled him to a stop.

“aah!” Sonic yelped as he fell to the ground. Blaze looked at him shocked. She didn’t realize how she was now.

“Sorry.” She said with a sad look in her eyes.

Sonic looked up at her. “It’s ok. So why the hold up beautiful?” He asked.

A blush came across her face. ”Beautiful? “ She thought to herself. “Well sonic I don’t know if you noticed, but I’m wearing a bed sheet like a toga.” She said as she pointed to her make-shift dress.

“So?” He said to her as if there was nothing wrong with it.

“I’m not going to walk around in toga all day! I need to get some real clothes!” She said angrily

“ Ok! Ok! But can I treat you to breakfast after you get some new clothes!” He asked her hoping she would say yes.

“I guess.” She said wondering why he was so eager to treat her to breakfast.

She looked across the street to see a clothing store called “Large and Wide”. She ever thought she would be shopping at a store like this before. She walked across the street to the store with sonic following her. The two looked at different clothes from dresses to t-shirts and jeans. Blaze grabbed a large pair of dark purple stretchy sweat pants and a sonic got her a big t-shirt he thought she would look great in. The T-shirt was black with white letters on the front that spelled “Neko”. She didn’t care what it said as long as it covered her. She grabbed some panties and a bra and walked over to the fitting room. While she was changing, she explained how she got so fat to sonic while he waited for her outside.

“So big fattened you up?” he asked seeing if he heard her correctly.

“Yeah, apparently he’s a very good cook, and gives his guests very generous portions of food. Too much if you ask me.” She said a little angry.

“Once I had lunch at his house, I had to lie to him saying tails needed me for something to avoid eating anymore.” He said with his hand behind his head.

“Well I wish someone told me about this before I went there. Anyway sonic I have a question for you now, why do you want to treat me to breakfast and why did you call me beautiful?” She asked him a little curious.

“Well…you see…I had this crush on you sense the first I met you and I kinda have this thing for big women.” He said shyly.

There was a moment of silence. Sonic felt he may have upset her. But suddenly.

“Sonic…I’ve had a crush on you too. I would love to have breakfast with you.” She said a little excited.

She came out of the booth in the fitting room. Sonic looked her over. Her clothes were a little baggy, but sonic knew with a few meals he could help fit them better.

“How do I look?” She asked him make a little pose.

“You look great!” He said wagging his tail a little bit.

Blaze bent down and hugged sonic. She could tell sonic enjoyed this very much. After that the two walked up to the register with some other t-shirts, sweat pants ,a dress, panties, and another bra. After they paid for blazes new clothes, the cashier put the clothes in some bags for them and the two left.

“So were do we go for this breakfast you promised me?” She asked him now very hungry.
155112222.title: Go get new clothes first, then go eat!

choices: They fall a sleep on the couch!
1551122221.content:
Sonic and blaze walked down the street to the restaurant . Blaze looked up and read the sign.

(“Joe’s Breakfast buffet!” All you can eat for $4.99)

“Your gonna love this! They have every breakfast food you can think of in here.” He said to her with his trade mark smile.

“I’m just gonna get a bowl of oatmeal.” she said coldly.

“What!? But don’t you want to get some donuts or some bacon or something else?” Sonic asked a little shocked.

“Sonic! I got to lose this weight, the guardian of the sol emeralds can’t be walking around looking like this!” She said jiggling her big belly.

“I really doubt your going to eat a bowl of oatmeal and be satisfied.” He said to her laughing a little.

“Oh yeah! Watch me!” she said has she walked inside. Sonic followed her as he watched her swing her tail on her big kitty butt.

(One hour later)

Sonic and blaze were being run out of the restaurant, with the owner of the restaurant chasing them out. He was a rooster wearing a apron and a chef hat.

“Get out and stay out!” Joe yelled at them.

“Hey! The sign say’s all you can eat, you stupid chicken!” He said pointing at the sign angrily.

“Yes it does, but at doesn’t mean eat it all! You and your fat friend are forever banned from Joe’s Breakfast buffet!” He yelled as he stormed back inside, closing the door and putting a sign in the window. (Closed!) and written under it in marker (Because someone ate it all!)

Sonic shook his head and walked over to blaze, who was sitting on a bench near by. She didn’t seem to upset about what the hot headed rooster was screaming about. She was just sitting there rubbing her big belly and licking the leftover donut icing off her lips.

“So what happened to just a bowl of oatmeal?” He asked with his arms crossed and smiling.

Blaze frowned “As soon as I smelled all of that food at the buffet, I caved in. Sonic I got to do something this is getting out of hand!” She said really upset.

“Why don’t you just except it and enjoy being fat.” He said giving her kiss on the cheek.

“Wait! That fox friend of yours ...um..tails!, Maybe he can help me with one of his inventions! She said happily to her idea.

“You didn’t hear a single word I just said did you?” he asked her a little annoyed

“Let’s go ask tails if can help.” She said as she grabbed her bags of clothes and started walking to tails workshop.

Sonic just shrugged his shoulders and followed her. When they got there they walked in and found tails working on something.

“Hey tails, I was wondering if you can help blaze with a little problem?” He asked him.

“Sure sonic.” The little fox turned around and suddenly had a shocked look on her face. ”B..Blaze?” He asked the big cat standing in front of him.

“Yes, it’s me tails.” She said a little embarrassed

Sonic then explained to him about what happen to her. After a few minutes of thinking tails had a idea.

“There is this one project I have been working on for a while. I haven’t tested it yet but it should work.”

Tails ran to the back of his shop and came back with what looked like a simple cookie.

“This is a experimental weight cookie, it should help you with you problem.” He said as he handed her the cookie.

Blaze didn’t wait a second, she popped the cookie in her mouth, chewed it up and swallowed it.

“Wow! That was delicious, the best cookie I ever eaten!” She said licking her lips.

Her stomach started to growl.

I think I can feel it working!” She said in excitement

Suddenly instead of losing weight, her body started to swell up with fat.

“AHH! Tails!” She screamed

She soon stopped after gaining 150 pounds, bringing her current weight up to 650 pounds. Her new clothes were no longer baggy, they seemed to be the right size now.

“Tails I wanted to lose weight, not gain it!” She yelled at the little fox.

“Lose weight! I can’t make anything like that, its scientifically impossible. I thought you wanted to gain weight. Scientist have tried for years to make an instant weight loss formula, but have failed. If I could make that I would be a billionaire.” He said with a little laugh.

“Why you!” She formed a fireball in her hands in anger.

“Aaaahhh!” Tail yelled as he ran away in fear.

Blaze chased tails around the workshop as sonic just stood there and watched. He couldn’t help but watch blaze run around after tails. He loved watching her body jiggle around as she chased the little fox around the shop. Tails was jumping over crates and ducking under tables trying to escape the her wrath. But blaze just picked them up and threw them aside as if they were nothing. Apparently her new size has given her amazing strength. Eventually she got tried of chasing him, and walked back up to sonic.

“I need to sit down for a few minutes.” She said to sonic as she wiped some sweat off of her face.

Sonic walked blaze over to a couch in the workshop and they sat down,. Blaze kicked off the sandals she was wearing, and relaxed. Sonic then started to rub her belly.

“Oh that feels nice!” she said as she purred. She then started to think about her new body size and how sonic loved her being this way.

“Sonic?” She asked him.

“Yes blaze?” He looked up at her.

“Do you really like me like this?” She asked him while she jiggled her.

“I think your beautiful!” He said looking into her lovely yellow eyes.

Blaze smiled and pulled sonic into a hug.

“Well ,I guess I’ll stop trying to lose this weight then.” She said as she laid back on the couch with sonic in her arms. “But you’ll have to help me guard the sol emeralds from now on!” She told sonic. Sonic nodded in agreement.

“I love you blaze!” He said looking her in the eyes

“I love you too so….”

Blaze was suddenly cut off as sonic leaned in and kissed blaze. It startled her at first, but then she kissed back. The two laid there kissing each other for almost ten minutes.

“Does this mean you won’t try and hurt me now blaze?” Tails asked a little scared.

Blaze and sonic suddenly stopped and looked at tails, wondering how long he had been standing there.

“I promise not to hurt you, if you give us some alone time!” She said with fire in her eyes.

“Yes of course! Sorry!” He said as he backed away.

“So what should we do now?” Sonic asked her lovingly.
1551122221.title: Eat at joe's!

choices: Go get some fast food for her!
15511222211.content:
“You know Sonic, I’ve ever been to your house before! Can we go there?” She asked the blue hedgehog resting on her belly.

“Sure, but if Amy ever asks, you don’t know where I live!” He said with the thought of the pink fan girl who is always chasing him.

“I promise I won‘t tell amy!” She said as she kissed him again.

The two got off the couch and got ready to go. Blaze put her sandals back on and grabbed her shopping bags. Sonic grabbed a few bags to after he put his trademark shoes back on. As they were about to walk out the front door of the workshop, Sonic heard a familiar voice call out for him that sent a chill down his spine.

“Sonic! Are you here my love?” Yelled Amy as she was walking up to Tail’s workshop.

“AH! Ok this call’s for drastic measures!” He said in a panicked tone as he grabbed Blaze’s bag of sol emeralds and pulled one out. He then grabbed Blaze’s hand.

“Sonic! What are you doing?” She asked him as he held the emerald up.

“Chaos Control!” He yelled as he and Blaze disappeared.

Amy then walked in the workshop and looked around.

“Aw, I was sure he would be here.” She said in disappointment. Tails then walked in, from the back of the shop.

“Oh hey Amy! What are you doing here?” He asked her as he wiped some oil off of his hands.

“Was sonic just here? I’m still looking for him.” She asked hoping she can still catch up with him.

Tail’s thought for a second, Sonic properly didn’t want her chasing him right now. Maybe he can help him with this problem.

“No he hasn’t been here!” He lied. “Amy I think you need to give up on Sonic and maybe give someone else a chance!” He said as he walked up to her.

“Someone else a chance? Like who?” She asked him curious as who he was talking about.

“Like me! I really like you Amy!” He said as he took her hands into his and looking into her eyes lovingly.

“Oh Tails, Your really sweet, but I think I should talk to Sonic first!” She said as she started to turn and walk out the door.

Tails panicked. He really did love Amy and he didn’t want her to go looking for sonic again. Suddenly he had a idea.

“Amy wait!” He said hoping to stop her from leaving. She stopped and looked back a him.

“Yes Tails?” She asked wondering what he wanted.

Tails walked into the kitchen and came back with a plate of his weight gain cookies.

“Before you go, how about you help yourself to some cookies!” He said with a smile.

Amy licked her lips, she loved cookies. Especially fresh baked ones.
“Well, maybe a few!” She said as she picked some up and started eating them.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------

Elsewhere, on the Emerald hill zone. There was a flash of light and Sonic and Blaze appeared. Blaze looked around at their new surroundings.

“What did you just do?” She asked amazed at what just happened.

“That was chaos control! I can teleport from one place to another with it.” He explained as he handed the sol emerald back to Blaze.

Blaze put the emerald away and looked around.

“So you live in the emerald hill zone! Where’s your house?” She asked looking around.

“Right over here!” He said as lead her over to a waterfall.

“We aren’t going get wet are we?” She asked a little worried.

Sonic then reached behind a tree by the waterfall and pressed a hidden button. A slide like object came out of the middle of the waterfall. Forcing the water to pour to the side, making a clearing behind the waterfall appear revealing a door. Blaze was speechless.

“Right this way my love!” He said letting her go first.

Blaze walked into the hidden house with Sonic following her. After they walked inside and closed the door the slide went back and the waterfall went back to normal. Inside Blaze looked around the place. It was amazing. It had many rooms in it ,a living room, game room, etc. After Sonic showed her around the, he turned to Blaze and smiled.

“So what do you want to do now?” He asked her.

“Show me your bedroom. I wanna lay down and take a nap!” She said tired from walking around all morning.

Sonic took her to his bedroom. When they got there Blaze sat down on the bed and took her sandals off.

“Sonic do you wanna take a nap with me?” She asked him sweetly.

“Maybe later, I gonna go play some video games, and maybe some…ah!” Sonic stopped in mid sentence as he looked over at Blaze.

Blaze had taken her sweat pants off. She was sitting there on his bed wearing just her t-shirt, and her panties. She sat there rubbing her big belly.

“Are you sure you don’t wanna take a nap with me? I’d love to cuddle up with you right now.” She said giving him a seductive smile.

“OK!” Is all he said as he jumped into bed with her.

The two cuddle up and kissed each other. Blaze wrapped her arms around Sonic and they went to sleep.

Later that day, Blaze and Sonic were awaken by a loud growling sound.

“What was that?” Sonic asked a little shocked .

“That…that was my stomach, I’m hungry!” She said a little embarrassed.

Sonic looked over to the clock, It was 12:03 pm. He then looked back to his love.

“It’s time for lunch! Do you want me to make some lunch for you or would you like me to go get some fast food?” He asked her.

"Being thin didn't appeal to me very much, so I thought I'd fatten myself up," Blaze said, patting her stomach. "I also started liking the idea of eating more. I want to be able to indulge in as much good food as I can." The cat dug into a parfait cup and found the button on her pants beginning to strain.

"I never really got why girls don't do that more often," Cream said after swallowing some ice cream. "If you like eating, you should go ahead and eat!"

"I'd always want to do that, but I kept being afraid of getting fat," Amy added. "All that food felt too good to resist, though, plus I don't think Sonic cares how big I am." The pink hedgehog finished off a cake shot and moved onto a mousse cup. Her belly stretched further and neared the table.

"It feels nice to make your tummy bigger, too!" Cream discreetly lifted her dress to give herself a few pats. "Hee hee, if we keep this up, Amy, we're going to need bigger dresses in no time!" Amy nodded while biting into a truffle. Blaze was fortunate to have friends who shared her newfound gluttony. The three girls patted their tight tummies once they finished, but were interrupted when they heard a pinging noise. Blaze's pants button flew off and landed in one of her empty dessert cups. Amy and Cream tried stifling giggles, but Blaze let one out that encouraged the younger girls to laugh with her. They continued their laughing as they slowly exited the buffet, their bellies so weighed down with food they practically waddled out. Amy and Cream's had ridden up their dresses, exposing a small bit of their white panties. Blaze's own underwear peeked out from the gap in her opened pants.

The stuffed trio made their way to Cream's house, where Amy and Blaze would sleep over. Cream's mother Vanilla greeted them when they arrived.

"Welcome back, girls. Oh, Blaze, wonderful to see you again!" Blaze smiled at the older rabbit's presence.

"Nice to see you again, ma'am." Blaze then noticed something was different about Vanilla. While Cream had just stuffed herself full, her mother had definitely been putting on weight. Her face had gotten rounder, her skirt rode a bit higher on her legs (which looked thicker), and her belly poked out from under her blouse. The cat turned to the kitchen table and saw an empty carton of ice cream.

"Did the girls treat you to a nice meal?"

"Yes, very much so," the princess replied.

"And did you decide you were going to gain weight with them?" Blaze realized she hadn't thought about what Vanilla might think about her daughter fattening herself up, but if Vanilla herself was getting fat, she must've been fine with it.

"Actually, yes. I felt it was time to grow." Vanilla smiled at this response.

"That's good to hear. I had the same idea, cooking so much and feeling I should enjoy it as much as I can." She turned to her daughter. "Cream had told me she always wondered why girls had to watch what they ate, and I started to wonder, as well."

"So Mama started to eat more and more and she let me eat more so we could get fat together." Cream led the girls up to her room. "We're hoping more girls can do that with us."

"In the morning, I'm going to help Vanilla make a big breakfast for us," Amy chimed in. "You're going to love it."

"I'm sure I will," Blaze said. She lowered herself to the floor of Cream's room to rest her stomach. She liked the fullness but the aching from overstuffing it didn't help. Still, she'd be getting used to it on her journey into fatness.

As Sonia was eating her belt snapped and her belly was starting to hang out slightly. As they were still eating Aleena got a call from Maggie, and she asked if Sonic, Sonia, and Manic, could come over, and Aleena said that it would be okay.

After breakfast, Sonia went to her room and changed into a new dress, she was well over sixhundred pounds and so were Sonic and Manic, but none of them were bothered by the weight they had gained. Soon after they left the house, and they were on their way to see Maggie and Alice, but they also ran into Cyrus and Knuckles.
"Hey Cyrus, hey Knuckles, what have you been up too?" Asked Sonic.
"Nothing too exciting, and how have you been." Asked Knuckles.
"I'm doing just fine, and we plan to see Maggie and Alice today." Said Sonia, judging by the way Knuckles looked Sonia estimated that he weighed fivehundred and thirty pounds, and Sonia could not take her eyes of of Knuckles belly, and knuckles could not take his eyes off of hers.
"I may have to keep replacing my clothes every week, but I enjoy being fat." Answered Cyrus, as placed his hand on his big belly, and judging by the way he looked, he weighed five-hundred-and-forty.

When they arrived at their friends house Alec said. "There are more guests than we expected, but come on in." Said Alec
When Alice saw Manic, she gave him a big hug, and kissed him on the cheek.
"How are you feeling Manic?" Asked Alice.
"I'm just glad I'm here." Answered Manic.
Maggie also gave Sonic a big hug and a kiss. and she spoke to Sonic.
"I'm glad you are here Sonic, and I'm glad you bought more friends over." Said Maggie.
"I'm very glad too see you Maggie." Answered Sonic

They played games for a while, and watched movies. At around Noon they were all feelign very hungry. Maggie and Alice had made plenty of extra food in advance, and no one went hungry, they then went into the living room to relax. Manic sat next to Alice, Sonic sat next to maggie, Sonia sat next to Knuckles, and Cyrus and Alec sat in chairs.
"That food was good, I mean really good." Said Manic
"I'm glad you liked it." Answered Alice.
"Well Knuckles, do you have any plans for today?" Asked Sonia.
"I'm so full, that I don't even want to get up." Answered Knuckles
"I don't mind sitting her, I can put on more weight now." Said Sonic.
"I can tell Sonic, and the belly suits you very well." Said Maggie.
"You have been very good to us, but what happenned to your parents." Asked Sonia.
"I'm hoping they did not wind up robotisized." Said Cyrus.
Alice and Maggie were still worried about there mom and dad, but one of them had to tell what happened. So maybe they could find there parents.
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: Sonia's Concern

choices: She wakes up during the night.
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
"Well see we never found them we got separated a while after Robotnik took over. There were two packs of the resistance that whent on a mission together and our's was part of it. While most of the Adults and teens were on the mission the encampment was discovered and we had to scatter quickly. Maggie and I were taken by some of the people from the mountain resistance and Alec was on the mission with Mom and Dad. A few months later he finally tracked us down, he had been with our parents for a while until they go separated during another raid near the great sea. We never could find our parents after that." Alice said.

"Yeah we've tried contacting former members of all the resistance groups but we were never succesfull. After all it was hard to even find former members let alone leaders who would know everyone in their group along with how to contact them now." Maggie said.

"Oh man, I've heard about that stuff happening..." Sonic said sounding sad.

"Well at least we have each other and Alec. So its bad but not to horrible. We hope we can find them one day but with each year it seems more likely that they died and weren't robotized, if they were we probably would have found them by now." Alice added.

The room fell silent for five minutes. After they turned the TV on agian and watched some more TV. Alice got up a half hour later to get a snack and asked if anyone else wanted anything. Sonia and Sonic said yes so Alice walked into the kitchen and gabbed a couple of large containers of chocolate icing(stuff you put ontop of cake.), spoons and milk.

"You making a cake?" Sonic asked surprised at first to see her just bringing containers of icing and milk.

"No, just felt like having something chocolate, if you want anything else I'll get it for you." Alice said.

"No thanks sounds good, just odd." Sonic said. The three then ate the chocolate icing over the next twenty minutes.

"Sonia you have some chocolate on your mouth." Knuckles pointed out a little while after they finished eating. She quickly rubbed it off with a napkin, embaressed.

"Don't worry it was cute you couldn't have known." he said.

They then relaxed talked some more for a few hours. At around seven they werre starting to get hungry agian so they headed out to a local buffete after Alec headed back to his house.

They six teens had to sit at a long table instead of a booth that they would have perfered because of their size, they couldn't fit in the booths. Sonic sat across from Maggie, Alice across from Manic and Sonia across from Knuckles. Sonia had 3 steaks, three potatoes, two jumbo sodas as well as corn, and carrots. Sonic had four steaks, three chicken wings and peas. Manic had two steaks, 3 chicken leggs, stuffing and a large salad. Knuckles had four steaks and some corn. Alice had two chicken legs, 4 medium thickness slices of ham and corn. Maggie had some roast beef, ham and carrots.

"Oh man that was some good food." Sonia said as she patted her belly.

"Agreed, I still think I'm gonna have dessert though." Manic said.

Hey lets make things a little fun since most of us here like the eating compitetions, who ever can eat the most dessert doesn't have to help pay for the meal." Maggie suggested.

"I'm in," Sonia said, "Same here Alice and Manic." said at the same time.

"I think we'll sit this out." Knuckles said and Sonic nodded.

Alice, Maggie, Manic and Sonia all went up and grabbed some cake, ice cream and doughnuts. Alice, Manic and Sonia plowed through their first helping while Maggie was only able to eat about half of her helping and gave it to Alice. After that Sonia and Manic made it through three more helpings while Alice only made it through two. Sonia and Manic were feeling very full so they called it a draw and Alice, Maggie, Sonic and Knuckles all paid for the meal which was only about five dollars for each person due to it being an all you can eat buffete. Alice and Maggie had to head to the clothing store quickly before it closed due to their extra weight stretching their clothes so Knuckles walked to the triplets home and kissed Sonia goodnight gave her a hug and headed back to his home. They looked at the clock it was about ten at night and Aleena had gone to bed so the triplets all headed to their rooms and got ready for bed.

After getting changed into her pajamas was actually a bikini she found more comfortable than her night gown Sonia looked at herself in her thee view mirror. Her belly was huge and her arms were about a foot wide and her hips were about 3 feet wide. Her butt was 3'3" and stuck out a foot behind her. Her face had also filled out and had a double chin still. After that she got into bed and fell asleep with a smile on her face about how beautiful she seemed to herself and most defiantly Knuckles as well.
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: Good day forthe most part.

choices: They Go Over To Alec's House
They Invite Alec OVer To There House
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
Sonia fell fast asleep, and her bed was nice and warm, and as she was sleeping she dreamt about Knuckles feeding her and saying some nice things about her. "Well Sonia, you seem to be very hungry and that is very good." Said Knuckles. As he gave Sonia some more food, until she could not eat any more."
She continued to dream about Knuckles and there future.

It was eight in the morning an Sonia got up, along with Sonic and Manic.
"You seem kind of worried about something, is there something I can do?" Asked Aleena.
"After breakfast we can tell you." Answered Sonia.
Aleena, Sonic, Sonia, and Manic sat down and began to eat, and after an hour, they heard a knick at the door, and Aleena answered it.
"Can I please come in, It is important." Said Marie (Alec's Wife).
"Come on in and sit down, but why are you so worried." Asked Aleena

Marie began to tell about another loss in her husbands life, but it was not and she began to cry a little. "It happened a while after Alec lost his mom and dad. He was friends with another hedgehog named Deryl, he was my older brother and Alec's best friend. He said he would always look after me and that they would be friends no matter what happened. During the mission, his unit was ambushed, some of the members were caught and robotsized, some were missing, and some were killed. He has taken this loss very hard, and not only that, but he has lost a lot of weight. During the war we married, but I'm worried about his health, and his his life, can you help my husband?"
"I will talk to him." Answered Sonia.
"If you are coming, then I'm coming." Said Sonic
"How about we all go." Said Manic.
"I guess I do have friends in low places, but should we invtie him over here or come over to my house" Asked Marie
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: Friends In Low Places

choices: How He Helped Maggie and Alice Accept Change
The Trouble He Got Into While Trying To Find His Family
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
"I think it would be good if we could invite Maggie, Alec, and Alice over." That way I could help Alec, with his problem." Said Aleena.
"Oh thank you my queen, I owe you a lot." Answered Marie.
Aleena then called Maggie and Alice, and then she called Alec shortly after.
When Maggie hung up the phone she was excited and Alice asked her sister.
"What are you so excited about Maggie?"
"Aleena invited us over, that is why I'm excited." Answered Maggie.
"Oh boy, now I am excited!" Said Alice
Maggie and Alice went over to Alec's house and Alice said. "Hey Alec, Queen Aleena invited us over for dinner, she expects us there in an hour."
"If we are invited guests, then I will go, but why were we invited." Asked Alec.

Maggie, Alec, and Alice showed up at the palace and Alec knocked on the door. Aleena then answered it and let the three triplets in and they sat down at the table.
The meal was very well prepaired and there was all kinds of foods, which included:
chicken, ham, fish, corn, carrots, green beans, all kinds of bread, baked potatoes, and other foods .
Aleena took six pieces of chicken, fish, carrots and green beans.
Sonic also took six baked potatoes and twelve pieces of chicken.
Sonia had one of every thing.
Manic decided to eat, five pieces of steak, five baked potatoes, and sixteen pieces of chicken.
Maggie, Alec, and Alice finished off the rest of the food, but they were all still hungry. Aleena the took out several pies, cakes, and ice cream. After they were finished eating, they went to the living room.

"Thank you for the food your highness." Said Alec
"Not a problem Alec, now Marie was worried about you, so can you tell me what is wrong?" Asked Aleena
"It was a promice I made when I was in the resistance. My best friend was a hedgehog named Deryl and another Marie whom you have met. Well anyway we were very close and we made a a pact of friend ship. After we were seperated from our parents I vowed to find them, and Deryl agreed to help me. A year later Deryl had vanished on mission and I did not see him since. A week after the war ended Marie and I drew closer and we married. I remember that night very well. I will never forget it several objects exploded in size, and when I thought they were regular meteors." Answered Alec, and after that he told them...
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: A Pact Of Friend Ship

choices: They find out there's an eating contest
They decide to head to the beach.
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
"So yeah after the whole meteor thing happened Alice and Maggie were worried. So I helped them by trying to comfort them. It was kind of hard at first they were really upset and worried that it was harmful." Alec said.

"Sonia didn't take it well either." Aleena said and added, "She was mainly just concerned about her looks."

"Ah that, they haven't had much trouble about that. Mainly they were just worried about mobility issues at first. Over time as they saw heavier people weren't being hindered they warmed up to it.' Alec said.

"Yeah we were kinda worried about getting to fat to move eventually but it appears its not an issue anymore so we're cool with it." Maggie said.

"Yeah, it would have been very bad if we had faced mobility issues." Aleena said.

They then talked and played some board games for a while and had fun. Marine smiled looking noticing how her husband was having fun. After a few hours Alec, Marine went home along with Alice and Maggie. Aleena, Sonia and Manic watched some TV while Sonic went to bed. Aleena and Manic shared the couch because Sonia and Aleena were starting to get to wide to share the couch anymore . After an hour the three had a small snack and headed to bed.

The next day...
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: Fun night

choices: Sonia Tries To Settle The Problem
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
Tomorrow morning, The triplets along with there mother awoke, and they figured it would be the same usually but good day when Marie called and asked if they wanted to relax at the beach and that she had a surprise for them.
"Oh we can go, but what is the big surprise." Asked Sonia.
"If I told you then it would not be a surprise." Answered Marie
"What time do you want us there." Asked Sonia.
"At noon, and I will be seeing you soon." Answered Marie. Then she hung up.

At the beach Alec, Marie, and Deryl were waiting and then Sonic, Sonia, and Manic arrived at the beach.
"Hey Deryl, I have a surprise for you." said Alec
"What is it Alec?" Asked Deryl
You will soon see." Answered Marie
Alec and Marie took Deryl to where Sonic, Sonia, and Manic were and then he said.
"All right Deryl, meet my new friends. Sonic, Sonia, and Manic."
"Greeting, my friends." Then Deryl bowed to them.
"You really don't have to do that." Answered Sonia
"I just thought I would sow my respect to member of the restance." He Answered.

They sat down and ate and then they decided to go for a swim.
"Hey Sonic, the water is wonderful."Said Sonia
"Not a chance, I've had all the water I need on this trip." Answered Sonic
"I wouldn't be too sure about that." Said Sonia.
"What do you mean?" Answered Sonic.
Sonia then lifted up her leg and then Manic jumped down.
"Cannon Ball!" Sonic then ran and was splashed with water.
"Now that was funny." Said Alec
"I have to agree with you on that Alec. I was very funny." Said Deryl
"I'll get even with you that, just wait and see." Said Sonic.

"Where is that Hedgehog who splashed me, If I get my hands on him Ill-."
"Why did you have to come here Marcella, and why aren't you with Bartlebee?" Asked Alec.
Deryl then got out and answered. "That was Manic and he did not mean any harm."
"Well cousin we will see, If Robotnic were still around he would show you, you commoner!"

Five minutes later...

"Hey guys, I'm finally here" Aleena said cheerfully. "Mom you made it, how did you get here so fast" Sonia asked.

"I took my new supersonic cycle for a test spin" Aleena answered.
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: Aleena has arrived

1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
Aleena stepped off the bike and put the kickstand down and walked over to the group. Sonia noticed Aleena was fatter as she got closer. Her hips had thickened a little bit and her belly was slightly flabbier.

Marcella saw Queen Aleena and released they Alec and Deryl knew her so he quickly apologized and left. Sonia then asked Aleena, "So Mom how did you get that extra weight so soon?"

"Oh I grabbed a jug of cake icing on the way over here cause I was hungry. Apparently its fattening." Aleena said.

"Sounds good...I'll have to get some sometime. By the way my name's Deryl and its an honor to meet you your highness." Deryl said and bowed to Aleena.

"Its nice to meet you Deryl." Aleena said.

The teens then continued swimming and playing with a beach ball while the adults talked. After a while Sonia and Alice went onto the beach to tan. While they tanned several guys passing by looked them in awe of their beauty. However they were oblivious of this until Aleena mentioned it to them. After an hour they headed to the washing room and changed into some new bikinis that the five girls would wear for the rest of the day due to the others being wet and sand covered.

As they headed to the food court near the beach they noticed a sign for an eating contest. The girls decided to enter but they guys decided to sit it out and just get a regular lunch. There were twelve competitors in all. The eat contest was comprised entirely of snack foods and sweets. There was just but one round and the last person left would win. Marine came in seventh after giving up after her 20th dough nut, Maggie came in fourth after being unable to finish her third cake, she had eaten two dozen dough nuts, and five bags of cookies. Aleena gave in after finishing her 10th serving of pumpkin pie, finishing in 3rd place, Alice came in second after getting full on her 6th large cake and Sonia took first place. She had had 5 cakes, 3 dozens of dough nuts and four bags of cookies.

"Wow...that was incredible." Sonic said to Sonia.

"Yeah, I know I worked up a real appitite." she replied, patting her bloated belly.

"So where to now?" Alec asked.

They the decided to...
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: Day on the beach and an eating contest.

choices: Deryl Shows Them Around His House
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
"I know, lets go to the mall." Said Alice
"That sounds like a good idea." Said Manic
"It looks like I'm going to have to get a new dress, so that would be a good idea." Said Aleena.

At the mall ten minutes later:

"Sonia, do you think we could talk?" Asked Marie
"Sure, now what is on your mind?" Asked Sonia
"All I wanted to say is thanks for helping Alec, and I'm glad he learned to have fun again." As they watched Sonic, Manic, Deryl have fun and goof off.
"Thanks, and I'm glad we could help." Answered Sonia.
"You have a big appitite Sonia, but I bet you would have ate a lot more if I was making dinner. So would you and your family like to come over to Daryl's house with us?" Asked Marie
"That would be great." Answered Sonia, as she patted her bloated belly.

The mall was about ready to close early (Due to the fact that it was a holiday) and they left, Aleena did not her new supersonic cycle to get stolen, so she went home and put it away, but she promised to come over to Deryl and Marie's house. As the seven teens went back to Deryl's house, they sky was getting dark.
"I think we had better hurry if we want to miss the storm." Said Sonic
Surprisingley, Aleena managed to beat the storm, because as soon as they got into Deryl's house, it started raining.

"Because you all came over to my brothers house, I think I will make dinner." Said Marie.
"That sounds good, I'm starving." Said Sonia
"I hope you have plenty of room." Teased Sonic
Marie then started to get dinner ready, feeding eight hedgehogs would not be an easy task, but she was up to the challenge.

Manic was looking outside and he accidently bumped a hidden door and he began to fall backwards, but Alec grabbed his hand and said. "It looks like you accidently found our secret stair way." Said Alec
"All I did was lean against this wall here, and where does it lead to?" Asked Manic.
"I will tell you after dinner." Answered Alec.

It took four hours for Marie to prepair all the food, and there was a lot of it.
They all sat down and began to eat, and there was more than enough to go around.
"This is some of the best food I have ever tasted." Said Sonia, who was still happily eating.
"I have to agree with you on that Sonia." Said Marie
They continued eating and then they had lots of dissert, and there was no food left over. Soon after they sat down in the living room and it was still raining.

"That was some good food, and it was the best I have ever tasted." Said Aleena, as she rubbed her much bigger belly.
"Maybe you should open your own restaurant." Said Sonia, who was sitting next to her mother.
"I'll think about it." Said Marie
"What is down there, I'm eager to see?" Asked Manic
"I'll show you soon, right now I just want to relax." Said Alec

After an hour Alec and Deryl showed their visitors the hidden basement, and it was just a place for rest, relaxation, and a if someone in the resistance needed to hide, and when they looked outside it was still raining.
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: Up To The Challenge

choices: They go out to a buffete for breakfast.
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
For the next few hours they told stories to each other ranging from their childhoods to life in the resistance. Sonic told one story about when they were doing an raid on a bot factory and they forgot the explosive charges at the base. Overall they had a great time and lots of fun was had. After it started getting late they headed back home where they relaxed, had a snack and got ready for bed. When Sonia got into bed she noticed that she took up most of it and releaised that even though she wasn't weighing enough to break it she'd need to get a new, larger one in the near future. She quickly fell asleep after to the long day she had.

Later on in the night Sonia woke up and felt hungry. She threw on a robe and walked downstairs to the kitchen to find Aleena was already there making a small meal. "Hungry?" Aleena asked. Sonia nodded and started getting herself a few doughnuts and a glass of milk.

They then sat down at the table and ate, "So did you have fun today." Aleena asked getting up to move a second chair next to the one she was on so her thighs didn't hang over uncomfortably and sat on the middle of the two chairs.

"Yeah I did, what about you?" Sonia asked

"I did too. I think we may need to get new chairs soon, You and I are starting to get a little to wide for these, thank goodness we didn't get chairs with arms on them." Aleena replied.

"Yeah, I need to pick up some more flip flops or slippers to wear as well. My belly's is making it hard to pull boots on in the morning and off at night." Sonia said.

They then finished up their snacks and said good night to each other and went back to bed.

The next morning...
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: The rest of the night

1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
Early that morning Sonic, Sonia, and Manic, got up and they all noticed that they were taking up there entire beds and they would have to be replaced. As Manic was in his bed room he admired himself in the mirror and he patted his newer and larger belly. "Sonic, Sonia, and I need to visit Alice and Maggie more often." He then left his room to find Sonic and Sonia sitting on the couch and then Sonia asked Manic.
"Can you please help me with my boots?"
"And can you help me get my shoes on?" Asked Sonic
Manic then helped Sonic put on his shoes and then he helped Sonia put on her boots. Then Sonic helped Manic get his shoes on.
"I think we are going to have to be getting some new shoes, and not to mention some new beds, but I'm feeling very hungry right now ." Said Aleena

Sonic, Sonia, Manic, and Aleena then left the house and had breakfast, due to there recent weight gain, they sat at different tables. Sonic and Manic sat at one table and Aleena and Sonia sat at another. The food was very tasty and they found themselves going back to get more food. "I think I'm going to need a new dress before this day is over." Said Aleena, who was happily eating.
"I agree with you on that mother, but what about winter clothes, I would not want to lose any weight." Said Sonia.
"That is a great idea Sonia, thanks for bringing it up." Said Aleena

At the other table Sonic and Manic decided to talk about some things in there life.
"Is your mind on Alice or the food Manic, you have allready had fourteen plates of pancakes and your vest is starting to look tight." Said Sonic.
"Well Sonic, I think your mind is on Maggie, and I bet you would not mind spoiling her rotten." Said Manic, as Sonic was beginning to think about Maggie going into the coubard to get him more food. After an hour, Sonic, Sonia, Manic, and Aleena left and went down to the mall. "You three have fun, I'm going to look for some new beds." Said Aleena.

The three teens began to look around the store and they ran into Cyrus and he had gained a lot more weight on his stomach and his lower body.
"Hey guys I have not saw you in a while." Said Cyrus
"It is nice to see you again, and it looks like you put on some more weight." Said Sonia.
"I have been going to a lot of eating contests and I have been winning first place quite often, and I just finished some clothes shoping."
"I'm hoping we can still buy some of those flip flops you bought, because it is getting harder and harder to get into these shoes." Said Sonic
Cyrus showed them where he bought his flip flops and then Sonic, Sonia, and Manic bought some. They were much easer to get into, but they knew it would be better then having to struggle each morning and each night every day.
"You wouldn't happen to have any winter clothes by the way?" Asked Sonia
"Yes we do, they are in the back." Then Sonic, Sonia, Manic, and Cyrus but winter clothes and then they left.
"Why did you ask about winter clothes Sonia." Asked Sonic.
"I wouldn't want to lose any weight during the cold." Answered Sonia.
"Well, that makes since." Answered Manic
"Well, there is going to be another eating contest an noon today. I wonder of you would be interested in entering?" Asked Cyrus
"We can, but Aleena is busy." Answered Manic.
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: New Furniture and New Shoes

1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
The four then headed to the contest area and registered. The eating compitition was about 20 courses of various Dinners. It was held in a better part of the food court with five long tables and benches where three constestents sat on each side giving room for their size. The first course was steak, corn and carrots over two plates. All the contestants easily ate it. The second was a large chicken leg bucket with potatoes and soda. The third was a fish meal where a couple of contestants dropped out. The fourth course was a sheppards pie, by that time several contestants were starting to show weight gain as their stomachs digested earlier food. As the compitetion went on the meals started to repeat but got larger in serving size. By course 12 Sonic had dropped out along with several other competitors. Sonia's dress was being strianed but she kept going on. By the end of the fifteenth round Manic had dropped out and had gotten a much larger belly from the contest. At that point it was only Sonia and two more people left. Course 16 consited of 2 large hams, a large bowl of corn and five carrots. The next three rounds were similar in content only changing what meat and sides were there. In the 20th and final round they were given 8 large pizzas and five mozzarella sticks. One contestant dropped out almost immeditatly but Sonia and the other, a female, orange cat held in. In the end Sonia held out long enough to finish the last pizza, that the cat couldn't. After taking the last bite her dress tore off from the fifty pounds she had gained, luckily her bikini held up.

She wasn't really embarresed after all it was her bikini and it was common for people to wear swim wear should their closes ever tear. Her belly stuck out two feet and her arms were at least a foot and a half thick. Her thighs and rear were almost three feet wide and her legs about a foot thick near the ankles. She walked up to the overseer to collect the prize money. Sonic, Manic and Sonia then headed to the clothes store to get new clothes. Sonia got a dress that was five sizes larger than she needed as well as some new bikinis and Manic got some new vests. Sonic was about a quarter the size of Sonia and Manic was about half.

"You did incrediabe Sonia." Cyrus said patting her on the back.

"Thanks." Sonia replied after walking out of the changing the room.

"Yeah I can't believe you put away that much." Manic said.

"It takes a lot of will power and practice." Sonia said.

"So...what do you guys want to do now?" Sonic asked.
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.title: The contest.

choices: I Will Be Gone For A Week
I Will Be Gone For Two Weeks
1552211221211211221212122222112111111111.content:
After Sonic, Sonia, and Manic were done shopping, they were feeling board and the first thing that was on Sonia's mind was to give Maggie, Alec, and Alice a call. She then picked up the phone in the mall and called up their house and she heard Alice.
"Hello."
"This is Sonia, Alice and how are you doing?"
"I'm doing fine and I have some wonderful news." Answered Alice.
"What is it." Asked Sonia.
"I was about ready to call you, but do you think you can come over." Asked Alice.
"We were feeling board, so why not?" Answered Sonia.

Sonic, Sonia, and Manic then left the mall and went over to their friends, and Maggie answered the door. "Come on in, we have a surprise for you." She said.
Maggie then took Sonic, Sonia, and Manic into the living room and they saw four fat hedgehogs along with, Alec, Alice, Deryl, and Marie.
"Are these your parents?" Asked Sonia.

1552212221111211.content:
Mighty looked around the room and didn’t see honey anywhere. He got off the couch and walked around the house looking for her. “Maybe she’s in the kitchen!” He thought to himself. He walked in there and didn’t find her. He then walked down the hallway and saw a open door with a light on in it. “ That must be her bedroom, she must be in there!” He said as he walked in.

“Honey are you in ….!” He stopped in mid sentence. He found honey, but this wasn’t her bedroom, It was her bathroom. Honey was standing on a scale trying to check her weight. But that wasn’t what surprised him. She was wearing nothing but a towel wrapped around her. She quickly spun around and looked a mighty in surprise.

“Mighty!” She yelled with a blush on her face.

“AHH! Sorry sorry!” He said as he ran out of the room covering his eyes.

“Wait! Mighty come back I need your help!” She called back for him.

Mighty walked back in with a light blush on his face. He looked up at her.

“You need my help?” He asked her.

“Yeah, I can’t see what the scale says. Can you check it for me?” She asked her love.

“Sure” he said to the his heavy set feline, willing to help her.

Honey stepped back up onto the scale as mighty been down and checked what the numbers stopped at.

“Well! What does it say?” She asked excited.

“410 pounds!” He said to her with a smile.

“Woo hoo!” She yelled as she jumped up and down with her arms in the air, forgetting she was holding the towel on her hands. Suddenly her towel dropped to the ground and she was just standing there…naked! Mighty’s eyes shot open as he got an eyeful of the big beautiful kitty.

“Aaahh! Don’t look!” She screamed as she covered herself with her hands and blushing madly.

Mighty’s face turned completely red, blood shot out of his nose, and he passed out on the floor. A few minutes later, mighty woke up in honey’s bedroom on her bed. Honey was standing there wear a red bathrobe, looking over him with a look of worry on her face.

“Are you ok mighty?” she asked him as she rubbed on of his ears.

“I had the greatest dream ever, it about a me helping a beautiful angel.” He said with a smile looking up at her while taking her hand into his.

Honey blushed that what he said. “Stop your making me blush.” She said as she been down and gave mighty a kiss on the cheek.

“Mighty I remember you were telling me about yourself at dinner last night, while I was eating and..” She started to ask him a question, when suddenly mighty sat and spoke.

“You could hear me though all that eating?” He asked her jokingly.

She gave him a stern look at this remark. Mighty then sat back down.

“Sorry! I’m listening?” He said with a look of apology on his face.

“As I was saying, you said you live in the forest. Right?” She asked him.

“Yeah, why?” He asked wondering about her question.

“Well do you sleep in a small house or a cabin or something?” She asked another question.

“Actually I live in a tent.” He said a little embarrassed.

“A tent! What do you do during a storm?” She asked him a little worried.

“Well sometimes I hide out in caves and then after the storm I have put my tent back up.” he said a little embarrassed.

“That’s horrible! Mighty how would you like to move in with me?” She asked him feeling sorry for him.

“I ..I don’t know honey, are you ok with me moving in?” He asked her

“Well we can pretty say were boyfriend and girlfriend now right?” She said as she laid down beside him on the bed.

“Well… when you put it that way….OK!” He said with a smile.

“Yay!” She giggled as she rolled over on to mighty and started to kissing him.

Mighty felt her fat body press against him. She felt soft and warm. She then rolled off of him and got off of the bed. She then walked back over to the bathroom.

“I’m gonna take a shower now. Do you want to take one when I’m done.” She asked him.

“Sure!” Is all he could say as he laid there looking at her lovingly.

Honey giggled to herself as she went into the bathroom and closed the door. Mighty Then thought about breakfast. Should he make her a big breakfast or take her out somewhere to eat.

155221222111121122.content:
Mighty laid there thinking about what to do for breakfast. He then remembered a donut shop that delivers donuts to your house or workplace.

He got up and picked up the phone on the nightstand by the bed ,looked up the number in the phone book, and dialed it. He listened as it rang, until suddenly someone answered.

“Good morning! Suzie’s donut shop, this is lucy, may I take your order?” asked lucy in a sweet voice.

“Yes, I would like to order your sunrise special.” He said as he looked at the ad.

“Ok! Is this for a broad meeting or something?” She asked.

“Why do you ask?” He wondered.

“Well we usually make these for broad meeting or other a events. The special comes with 80 donuts and 2 gallons of chocolate and regular milk.” She explained.

“Um…yeah were having a meeting ..with a lot of people.” He lied

“All right we’ll have it delivered in no time.” She said cheerfully

After mighty gave her the address and a thank you, he hung up the phone. Honey then walked out of the bathroom in her bathrobe and her hair up in a towel wrap.

“The showers all your’s mighty” She said as she winked at him.

“Thanks, after I finish I got a surprise for you for breakfast this morning.” He said to her with a smile.

“Cool, I’ll start getting dressed then, my sweet armadillo” She said as she bent down and gave mighty a kiss.

After their early morning kiss, mighty went into the bathroom and took a shower. A few minutes later he walked out of the bathroom drying himself off with a towel. He then looked over at honey who had just finished getting dressed. She was wearing a red t-shirt with a big black cat paw print shape on the front of it, a pair of blue jeans and some red and white sneakers. She was sitting there waiting for him, while she finished brushing her hair.

“How do I look?” She asked him as she sat down her hair brush.

“Beautiful!” He said throwing the towel into the clothes basket.

“So, what’s this surprise you were telling me about? She asked as mighty was putting his shoes back on.

“We need to go into the living room for this! It’s gonna be here any minute now!” He said as he walked over to honey.

Mighty then did something that took honey by surprise. He picked her up, sweeping her off her feet.

“Whoa! Your really strong!” The feline said a little shocked.

“They don’t call me mighty for nothing!” He said as he carried her into the living room without breaking a sweat.

Mighty rushed to the living room and sat honey down on the couch. Just then the door bell rang.

“I’ll get it!” Mighty said as he ran over to the door.

“I wonder what were having for breakfast?” She thought to herself.

Mighty came back with 8 boxes stacked on top one another, with two bottles of milk sitting on top of them. He then started to set the boxes on the coffee table and opening them up.

“Donuts!” She squealed with joy. She started grabbing donuts left and right, stuffing herself with the pastries.

Mighty quickly grabbed one chocolate donut for himself and poured himself a glass of milk. After eating his donut and drinking his milk, he just sat there by honey as she continued to go thought the boxes of donuts. She stopped once and a while and drink some milk, but then continue eating. When she got to her 5th box of donuts, mighty climbed behind honey and wrapped his arms around her waist, (Well half way around her waist, considering how wide she was!) and started kissing her neck. Honey stopped eating for a second.

“Ha ha ha! Mighty stop I’m ticklish!” She said giggling. “Let me finish eating and then we can play!” She said as she stuffed another donut in her mouth.

Twenty minutes later, she had finished eating all of the donuts. All that was left on the coffee table was some empty boxes and two empty bottles of milk. She was now just sitting there licking her lips.

“Did you enjoy your breakfast?” He asked her with a smile.

“Yep! Thank you mighty!” She said as she rubbed her belly.

“Do you want to play now?” He said jokingly

Honey then looked over at him and gave him a evil smirk. This sent a chill up his spine. Without warning she pounced him.

“Ack!” is all mighty could say before honey came down on top of him.

She showered him in kisses and nuzzled him sweetly. Mighty was overwhelmed with joy and not to mention her huge belly. After a few minutes she rolled over with him in her arms. The two laid there for sometime until honey looked over at the clock.

“Oh it’s 9 o’clock! I got to get going or I’ll be late for work!” She said as she sat up and sat mighty on the couch.

Mighty looked at her in confusion.” You have a job?” He asked as he grab the boxes on the table.

“Well yeah! Gotta make a living somehow!” She said as she grabbed the empty bottles on the table.

The two walked outside and stuffed the trash into a trash can she had by the backdoor. She then locked the door behind her.

“You wanna come with me and see what I do at my job?” She asked her boyfriend

“Sure! What do you do for a living anyway?” He asked her curiously

1552212221111211221.content:
“I’m a plus size model!” She said with a smile

“Who do model for?” he asked out of curiosity

“Many different big and tall clothing stores. Today me and the others are going to have a photo shoot for the “EXTRA” clothing companies winter apparel ” She explained

“EXTRA? I don’t think I’ve ever heard of that company before.” He said after thinking of the name for a sec.

“It’s a big and tall store, you would probably know more about it if you were big or tall.” She said as she bent down to look mighty in the eyes.

“Oh I see! But what do you mean by the others?” He asked her.

“There are other models other than me, some are big like me and some are tall like Thomas.” She explained as she stood back up.


“Whose Thomas?” He asked while walking along side his girlfriend.

“He’s a male model I work with. Trust me you’ll know which one he is when we get there.” She said as she looked at her watch. Her eyes went wide for a second.

“Speaking of getting there, we need to get going or I’m gonna be late!” She said as she started to walk a little faster.

“Don’t worry, just give me directions on how to get there!” He said with a smile.

Honey gave him a confused look. “ What do need directions for WAH!” She yelped as mighty lifted her of her feet once again with the greatest ease. He then started running down the sidewalk into the city carrying her.

“I never seam to get used to this!” She giggled as her boyfriend carried her off to their destination.

About twenty minutes later, they arrived at the studio. At the front door mighty let honey step back on to the ground and the two walked in. Inside they saw some of the big male models and some tall female models were leaving, as they have finished their photo shoot for the catalog . Mighty watched as some of the m a orange bear, a blue penguin, and a green elephant waved at honey as they left. He than saw some of the tall and thin female models walk by. One was a red flamingo and the other was a purple horse, they too waved at honey on the way out.

“So where’s this Thomas guy you were talking about?” He asked looking around the room.

“That would be me.” Said a voice out of no where.

Mighty looked around the room, but still didn’t see anyone. Honey than pointed behind mighty. Mighty turned around to a pair of long legs wearing black pant’s. He looked up to see the legs belonged to a yellow giraffe.

“Uh…Hi!” he said holding out his hand for a hand shake nervously. The giraffe bent down and shook hands with mighty.

“Mighty this is Thomas, he’s one of the other models that work here, Thomas this is my boyfriend Mighty!” She said as she introduced the two to each other.
“Nice to meet you Mighty. I’ll see you guys later!” He said as he stood back up and walked to the door.

“Ok! See ya later Thomas!” She said back to Thomas as he left.

“Wow! You didn’t tell me he was a giraffe!” Mighty said still a little shocked by how tall Thomas was.

“Well, you didn’t ask!” She said as she walked into the studio.

The two walked inside, where three other female big models were waiting. They waved at honey as they walked up. The first one was an white artic fox with blue eyes and blonde hair. She was wearing a black dress with black shoes. She was the same size as honey. The second model was a red bunny with blue hair red eyes. She was wearing a blue t-shirt with a carrot print on the front, a pair of blue jeans and white shoes. She was about 100 pounds heavier than honey. The last model was a regular colored panda with pink hair and brown eyes. She was wearing a red dress with sandals. She looked like she weighted about 650 pounds, making her the biggest of the models there.

“Mighty this is Crystal the fox, Ruby the rabbit, and Lily the panda!” She introduced him to the other models.

“Hi I’m Mighty the armadillo! Nice to meet yo..aahh!” Mighty yelped as Ruby and Lily pulled him into a hug.

“Honey he’s so cute!” Ruby said as she hugged him.

“He looks really strong too!” Lily said feeling one of his arms.

Mighty was trying his best to get free from the grip of the two large and lovely ladies as he was starting to blush. Crystal then walked over and rubbed one of his ears. This made him blush wildly.

“Is this cutie your boyfriend Honey?” Crystal asked smiling at honey to see if their over welcoming to mighty was starting to make her angry.

“Yes he is, and he’s with me so hands off!” She said angrily as she grabbed mighty to her side.

“Sorry!” Ruby and Lily said together with a sad look on their faces.

“Sorry Honey, we were just messing with ya!” Crystal said teasing her.

“Ok, just don’t do it again.” Honey said claming down a little.

“We promise!” The three said together.

Suddenly a blue ocelot walked in wearing black running shoes and white gloves. He was carrying a box with camera equipment in it.

“Looks like were about to get started, Mighty how about you go sit on that couch over there and watch.” Honey said pointing at the couch over by the wall.

“Ok, but who is that?” He asked pointing at the ocelot.

“That’s Snap the ocelot, he’s the one who’s going to take are pictures for the catalog, he‘s also are boss.” Honey said as she and the other ladies went into the dressing room.

“Oh ok, well I’ll just go over here and watch.” He said as walked over to the couch.

As he sat down he noticed there was someone else sitting on the other side of the couch. He was a big yellow polar bear wearing a red ski cap, green scarf, brown gloves and boots.

“Hi are you a model here?” He asked

The polar bear gave him an angry look and growled a little.

“I’ll take that as a no. Anyway I’m Mighty the armadillo, what’s your name? He asked now hoping the bear wouldn’t kill him.

“Bark the polar bear!” He said with a gruff voice.

“So why are you here?” He asked quietly.

“My girlfriend works here.” He said as he crossed his arms.

“Oh! Which one is she?” He asked

“Crystal, you know the fox who was rubbing your ear earlier!” He growled at him as he stood up and walked over to Mighty ready to snap him in half.

“Look man, I not trying take your girlfriend, I promise. She did that to tease my girlfriend Honey” He said trying to clam Bark down.

Bark looked at him for a second, thinking about what he just said. He than sat back down and relaxed a bit.

“Alright. I believe you.” He said as he crossed his arms.

“That’s it! You’re just gonna take my word for it?” Mighty asked him shocked.

“Yeah! She loves to joke around with Honey all the time.” He said as he laughed a little.

“I see! Well anyway, let’s start over then!” He said as he held his hand out.” I’m Mighty the armadillo, nice to meet you!”

Bark shook Mighty’s hand.” I’m Bark the polar bear! Nice to meet you too!” He said a little bit nicer tone.

After a few minutes the girls came back, wearing clothes you would wear in the winter. Coats, jackets, warm hats, etc. Snap had his camera ready.

“All right ladies let’s get started. Ruby, Honey we’ll start with you two first.” He said motioning over to the background they had set up.

The girls would walk up and pose, then go to the dressing room, change into different outfits, come back out and do a different pose, while Snap shot pictures of them. Mighty and Bark just sat back and watched as their ladies did their job. After a few hours they finished all of the winter clothes.

Snap look over to the women “All right ladies were almost done. You just need to model….

(Note: Bark the polar bear is also from "Sonic the fighters")

155221222222222222.title: Lupe the Wolf

1552212222222222221.content:
Ever Since Lupe had been made Queen of the Wolf Tribe, she had grown into the role as best she could... and not just figuratively.

The Lifestyle was much more sedentary than she had anticipated. People began to leave her Tributes, these tributes were usually food, savory and fattening, and each came in larger portions with every good deed she performed as Queen, making life easier for the masses while keeping them safe, safe from both the hostile powers such as the Eggman Empire, and the Dark Legion on the outside, and the criminals among them on the inside.

Furthermore, physical activity had been cut to a minimum, her newfound busy schedule signing orders, attending dinner parties with the elites of both her own new kingdom and foreign dignitaries, these parties became as lavish as they were frequent. Lupe didn't really have as much time for herself as she used to. Certainly not enough time to exercise away all the unwanted calories she acquired from eating the tributes which she loved for she insisted on being benevolent to her wolves, and the lavish dinners, which she felt an obligation to enjoy given the important matters discussed at such events.

Obviously these combined features resulted in her gaining a considerable amount of weight. Prior to the beginning of her reign as queen began after she was chosen by the entire tribe to be the queen, she weighed in at about 150 pounds, which by wolf standards and for a woman standing 6 feet tall is actually not very much, quite normal even.

In the 15 months since she had been made Queen she had gained 75 pounds, bloating her up to 225 pounds. Enough to make her a certified BBW by standards that those who are not Mobian wolves would consider "normal".

Lupe is still indecisive about how to feel about this change in lifestyle so she has done her best to maintain her figure. At first it was easy, but with each passing policy measure that brought joy to her subjects, and fancy dinner with an ambassador, the task became increasingly difficult as tributes flooded in and her daily routine became increasingly languid.

Currently Lupe is resting on the throne, a modest by most standards made of Wood and furs for the closest analogy to the aesthetics of her kingdom was what could best be described as Viking.

She was poking her now pudgy belly, wondering how much harder it was going to get to not put on weight, when one of the guards interrupted her thoughts with an announcement. "My Queen, some citizens have arrived to offer tribute." At hearing this Lupe sighed this was the 2nd time today, oh well what at least whatever it is will make a decent... no wait make that decadent lunch. "Very well, show them in." she commanded.

The citizens offering tribute were...
1552212222222222221.title: Hungry Like the (Queen) Wolf
